common.popupBlocked: Popup blocked. Please allow popups or open this URL manually: {url}

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Manage your resumes and job applications
dashboard.noResumesDescription: Upload your first resume to get started
dashboard.llmNotConfiguredMessage: > API keys are missing. Resume tailoring is disabled until configured in settings.
dashboard.setupRequiredMessage: > Configure API key in settings to enable resume tailoring.

uploadDialog.successMissingId: Upload succeeded but no Resume ID returned.

additionalForm.instructions: Enter items separated by new lines (press Enter for each item).

placeholders.awards:
Employee of the Month
Hackathon Winner

customSections.dialogDescription: Create a new section for your resume with a custom name and type.

sectionHeader.deleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.

generatePrompt.notAvailableDescription: To generate {title}, first tailor your resume with a job description.
generatePrompt.coverLetterDescription: Generate a tailored cover letter based on your resume and job description.
generatePrompt.outreachDescription: Generate a concise outreach message for LinkedIn or email based on your resume and job description.
generatePrompt.coverLetterFooter: Tip: tailor first for best results.
generatePrompt.outreachFooter: Tip: keep it short and personalized.

regenerateDialog.title: Regenerate {title}?
regenerateDialog.description: This will replace your current {title} with a newly generated one. Any edits you've made will be lost.

jdMatch.aboutDescription: This view shows how well your resume matches the job description. Keywords from the JD are highlighted in yellow on your resume, helping you see which skills and terms are already covered.
jdMatch.highlightedKeywordsDescriptionTemplate: Words highlighted in __COLOR__ appear in both the job description and your resume. A higher match rate suggests better alignment with the job requirements.
jdMatch.highlightedKeywordsDescriptionSuffix: appear in both the job description and your resume. A higher match rate suggests better alignment with the job requirements.

items.addMissingKeywords: Use the Resume tab to add missing keywords
items.focusTechnicalSkills: Focus on technical skills and tools mentioned in the JD
items.matchActionVerbs: Match action verbs from the job requirements

swissSingle.name: Single Column
swissSingle.description: Traditional full-width layout with maximum content density

swissTwoColumn.name: Two Column
swissTwoColumn.description: Experience-focused main column with sidebar for skills

modern.name: Modern
modern.description: Colorful accents with customizable theme colors

modernTwoColumn.name: Modern Two Column
modernTwoColumn.description: Two-column layout with modern colorful accents and themes

formatting.compactHint: Compact mode tightens spacing and line height. Margins and base font size stay literal.

alerts.saveNotAvailable: Save is only available when editing an existing resume.
alerts.saveFailed: Failed to save resume. Please try again.
alerts.downloadNotAvailable: Download is only available for saved resumes.
alerts.downloadFailed: Failed to download resume. Please try again.
alerts.coverLetterSaveFailed: Failed to save cover letter. Please try again.
alerts.coverLetterDownloadRequiresResume: Save the resume first to download the cover letter.
alerts.coverLetterMissing: No cover letter available. Enable cover letter generation in Settings and tailor a resume.
alerts.outreachSaveFailed: Failed to save outreach message. Please try again.

enrichment.title: Resume Enhancement

loading.analyzingDescription: Identifying areas that could use more detail
loading.generatingDescription: Using your answers to improve your resume

enrichment.shortcutHint: Press Shift+Enter for new line, Cmd/Ctrl+Enter to continue

preview.title: Review New Content
preview.description: Review the new bullet points that will be added to your resume

complete.title: Resume Enhanced!
complete.updatedFallback: Your resume has been updated with enhanced descriptions

noImprovements.title: Your resume looks great!
noImprovements.defaultDescription: We couldn't find any items that need improvement. Your experience and project descriptions are already well-detailed.

tailor.title: Tailor Resume
tailor.subtitle: Optimize your resume for a specific job
tailor.promptDescription: Choose how strongly to align your resume to the job description.

nudge.label: Light nudge
nudge.description: Minimal edits to better align existing experience.

keywords.label: Keyword enhance
keywords.description: Blend in relevant keywords without changing role or scope.

full.label: Full tailor
full.description: Comprehensive tailoring using the job description.

tailor.noApiKeyMessage: > No API key configured. Resume tailoring requires an LLM provider.

diffModal.title: Review AI Tailoring Results
diffModal.subtitle: Please carefully review the changes to ensure no false information has been added
diffModal.warningMessage: Please confirm these additions exist in your original resume or are reflected in your descriptions

regenerateDialog.title: Regenerate tailored resume?
regenerateDialog.description: This will discard the current preview and request a new AI tailoring result.

missingDiffDialog.title: Unable to calculate changes
missingDiffDialog.description: We could not compute a diff for this resume. This can happen with legacy resumes that lack structured data. You can continue to save the tailored resume or cancel to review later.

errors.jobDescriptionTooShort: Job description is too short. Please provide more details.
errors.apiKeyError: API key error. Please check your LLM configuration in Settings.
errors.rateLimit: Rate limit reached. Please wait a moment and try again.
errors.failedToGenerate: Failed to generate resume. Please check your settings and try again.
errors.failedToPreview: Failed to preview resume. Please check your settings and try again.
errors.failedToConfirm: Failed to confirm resume. Please try again.

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Configure your preferences
settings.aiProviderDescription: Select your preferred AI provider for resume analysis
settings.contentLanguageDescription: Language for generated content (resumes, cover letters)
settings.clearApiKeysDescription: Removes all stored API keys from the configuration. This action cannot be undone.
settings.resetDatabaseDescription: Deletes ALL data including resumes, jobs, and generated content. This action cannot be undone.

apiKeyMenu.title: OpenAI API Key
apiKeyMenu.description: Provide your key to enable hosted OpenAI models.

setupRequired.title: [ SETUP REQUIRED ]
setupRequired.description: > No API key configured. Add your LLM provider API key below to enable resume tailoring.

llmConfiguration.leaveBlankToKeepExistingKey: LEAVE BLANK TO KEEP EXISTING KEY
llmConfiguration.baseUrlDescription: Override the API base URL to use a proxy/aggregator endpoint. Leave blank to use provider default.

healthErrors.api_key_missing: API key not configured. Please add a key in Settings.
healthErrors.duplicate_v1_path: Health check failed. The Base URL may contain a duplicate /v1 path.
healthErrors.not_found_404: Health check failed. 404 Not Found - check that the Base URL matches the provider.
healthErrors.html_response: Health check failed. The Base URL returned HTML; it may be a console URL or an unsupported gateway path.

healthWarnings.empty_content: LLM returned empty content for the health check.

contentGeneration.title: Content Generation
contentGeneration.description: Enable additional content generation during resume tailoring. When enabled, these documents will be automatically generated alongside your tailored resume.

coverLetter.label: Cover Letter
coverLetter.description: Generate a tailored cover letter alongside your resume

outreachMessage.label: Cold Outreach Message
outreachMessage.description: Generate a networking message for LinkedIn or email

promptSettings.title: Prompt Settings
promptSettings.description: Choose the default prompt used for resume tailoring.

errors.unableToConnectBackend: Unable to connect to backend. Is the server running?
errors.apiKeyRequired: API key is required for the selected provider.
errors.failedToClearApiKeys: Failed to clear API keys. Please try again.
errors.failedToResetDatabase: Failed to reset database. Please try again.

resumeViewer.deletedDescriptionMaster: Your master resume has been permanently deleted from the system.
resumeViewer.deletedDescriptionRegular: The resume has been permanently deleted from the system.

errors.processingFailed: Resume processing failed. The AI service could not extract structured data from your resume. You can still use the Tailor feature or try uploading again.
errors.stillProcessing: Resume is still being processed. Please wait a moment and refresh the page.
errors.notProcessedYet: Resume has not been processed yet. Please use the Tailor feature to generate a structured resume.
errors.failedToDelete: Failed to delete resume. Please try again.

editor.placeholder: Your cover letter will appear here after tailoring your resume with cover letter generation enabled...
editor.tip: TIP: A good cover letter is typically 300-400 words. Edit as needed to personalize.

preview.emptyDescription: Enable cover letter generation in Settings, then tailor a resume.

editor.placeholder: Your cold outreach message will appear here after tailoring your resume with outreach message generation enabled...
editor.tip: TIP: Keep outreach messages brief (100-150 words). Copy and paste to LinkedIn or email.

steps.step1: 1. Copy the message using the button above
steps.step2: 2. Open LinkedIn or your email client
steps.step4: 4. Send to recruiters or hiring managers

preview.emptyDescription: Enable outreach message generation in Settings, then tailor a resume.

errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.
errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.notFound: The requested resource was not found.
errors.validationError: Please check your input and try again.

boundary.title: Something Went Wrong
boundary.description: An unexpected error occurred. This has been logged for review.

confirmations.deleteResume: Are you sure you want to delete this resume?
confirmations.deleteMasterResumeDescription: This action cannot be undone. Your master resume will be permanently removed from the system.
confirmations.deleteResumeFromSystemDescription: This action cannot be undone. The resume will be permanently removed from the system.
confirmations.discardChanges: Are you sure you want to discard your changes?
confirmations.discardChangesDescription: Any unsaved changes will be lost.
confirmations.clearApiKeysDescription: Are you sure you want to remove all API keys? You will need to re-enter them to use AI features.
confirmations.resetDatabase: Reset Database and Clear All Data?
confirmations.resetDatabaseDescription: This will permanently delete ALL resumes, job descriptions, and generated content. This action is irreversible.
